sentence.Network_cn: 即使在经验丰富的登山者中，平纳克尔峰也被认为是很难攀登的。

sentence.Network_cn: 一位徒步者从一块80英尺高的尖锥形岩石上摔了下来。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French, from late Latin pinnaculum, diminutive of pinna 'wing, point'

entry.def: A pinnacle is a pointed piece of stone or rock that is high above the ground.

example.ex: A walker fell 80ft from a rocky pinnacle.
example.tran: 一位徒步者从一块80英尺高的尖锥形岩石上摔了下来。

entry.def: If someone reaches the pinnacle of their career or the pinnacle of a particular area of life, they are at the highest point of it.

example.ex: John Major has reached the pinnacle of British politics...
example.tran: 约翰·梅杰已攀上了英国政界的顶峰。

example.ex: She was still a screen goddess at the pinnacle of her career.
example.tran: 她仍然是一位处于事业巅峰期的银幕女神。

means.word_mean: 1. (architecture) a slender upright spire at the top of a buttress of tower
2. the highest level or degree attainable;

sentences.sentence: "his landscapes were deemed the acme of beauty"
"the artist's gifts are at their acme"
"...catapulted Einstein to the pinnacle of fame"
"so many highest superlatives achieved by man"

means.word_mean: 2. raise on or as if on a pinnacle;

sentences.sentence: "He did not want to be pinnacled"

auth_sentence.content: In all our sports it's clearly the pinnacle.
auth_sentence.res_content: In all our sports it's clearly the pinnacle.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In all our sports it's clearly the pinnacle.

auth_sentence.content: The Olympics is the dream and pinnacle of sport.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Olympics is the dream and pinnacle of sport.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Olympics is the dream and pinnacle of sport.

auth_sentence.content: Others will say it is the pinnacle of luxury.
auth_sentence.res_content: Others will say it is the pinnacle of luxury.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Others will say it is the pinnacle of luxury.

stems_affixes.word_buile: de去掉+bacle=acle有block之意,大块东西→去掉大块东西→解冰块

stems_affixes.value_cn: 奇迹,令人惊奇的人[或事]
stems_affixes.word_buile: mir惊奇+acle东西→让人惊奇的东西
ob反对+st+acle……东西,状态→站着反对→障碍[物]
re再+cept拿+acle东西→拿东西的东西→容器
tent伸展,触,摸+acle……东西,状态→n.触须、触角,[植物]腺毛
man手+acle东西→手上的东西→手铐

sentences.en: He had reached the pinnacle of his military career.
sentences.cn: 他已经到达了军事生涯的顶峰。

sentences.en: Now he is at the very pinnacle of his career.
sentences.cn: 现在他正值一生中的顶峰时期。
